de.unifrankfurt.informatik.dbis.dia.model

Class ModelWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unifrankfurt.informatik.dbis.dia.model.ModelWrapper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    D2RQModel

    public abstract class ModelWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for wrapping a Jena-Model. A source-ID must be injected for identifying the source of certain objects found.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public com.hp.hpl.jena.query.ResultSet execute(com.hp.hpl.jena.query.Query query)
        executes the given Query to the containing Model via a QueryExecution. Before the execution is created, close() is called, that closes the last used QueryExecution.
        Parameters:
        query - the Query
        Returns:
        the ResultSet of the Query

      • close

        public void close()
        calls QueryExecution.close(), if there is an existing QueryExecution-object of a past execute(Query)-call.

        should always be called in a finally-block

      • getSrc

        public java.lang.String getSrc()
        Returns:
        the source-ID of the containing Model.
